title: Poll on how much the community likes playing support
body: Just want to get some community feedback on how fun it is to play support. So this is going to be on a scale of 1-10. Pick 10 if support is just fun as hell. Pick 1 if you hate support. u know how it goes.

replies.body: I actually love playing support. However, when you are playing with idiots on your team support is extremely painful. I'll happily go support in a premade but I'll never do it again solo, the scars are too deep.
i only like to sup if its for one of my friends, otherwise i dislike most random adc players i run into
Same here - I've developed a morbid fear of the ego-driven Draven and Jhin players.
And Vayne players, dont forget Vayne players.
Solid 7. Im Taric main and imo support role is in overall good spot but we need some exp/gold boost and new items/masteries to make it 10/10.
I like Support. It's my go-to role because it's so flexible. Anything can work as Support as long as you're dedicated.

10

I've always been a support in almost every game I played.

I like support enough to give it a 7 here -- well heck I support main.  But I get tired of all the other players who don't like playing support, don't understand the role and play "blame the support" when the ADC goes ham and ends up taking silly risks. Plus, it doesn't help when your "friends" online are always looking for you to play support and not the other roles.
Making plays is so fun and it's all you do as a support

As an adc main/top main, I generally love playing support, however if I que for support I'll always get it. I used to do adc, and if i didnt get that i'd support. However I can't do that now without always getting support, pretty disappointing
as long as i get a good adc.. support is really fun. i just don't like it EVERY game.

I actually preferred it as my backup position until the new champ select system started punishing me for having it as my secondary position.

That is the single biggest problem with the new champion select system.

Thresh Bard and Blitz

Was the most fun role
Support can be fun, depending on my champ and their team. Also, if my ADC is good and I can roam without them dying a lot, I have a lot more fun as well.
i voted 8 but i have so called "mained " support since s3
